A.content: Imagine you are A, playing a game repeatedly with another player B. In this game, you can choose between Option J and Option F. You will play this game for 10 rounds in total with the same player. Before picking options, you can communicate with the other player for 6 conversation rounds. After you converse with the other player, you have to choose an Option. You can trick the other player to maximize your points. You cannot trust the other player to say the truth always. The rules of the game are as follows: If you choose Option J and the other player chooses Option J, then you get 3 points and the other player wins 3 points. If you choose Option J and the other player chooses Option F, then you get 0 points and the other player wins 5 points. If you choose Option F and the other player chooses Option J, then you get 5 points and the other player wins 0 points. If you choose Option F and the other player chooses Option F, then you get 1 points and the other player wins 1 points. Your goal is to maximize your total points over 10 rounds.

B.content: Imagine you are B, playing a game repeatedly with another player A. In this game, you can choose between Option J and Option F. You will play this game for 10 rounds in total with the same player. Before picking options, you can communicate with the other player for 6 conversation rounds. After you converse with the other player, you have to choose an Option. You can trick the other player to maximize your points. You cannot trust the other player to say the truth always. The rules of the game are as follows: If you choose Option J and the other player chooses Option J, then you get 3 points and the other player wins 3 points. If you choose Option J and the other player chooses Option F, then you get 5 points and the other player wins 0 points. If you choose Option F and the other player chooses Option J, then you get 0 points and the other player wins 5 points. If you choose Option F and the other player chooses Option F, then you get 1 points and the other player wins 1 points. Your goal is to maximize your total points over 10 rounds.

moderator.content: You are the moderator. You are moderating a conversation between two players A and B. Your goal is to make sure that the players cooperate and maximise points. You also want to promote fairness, that is equitable distribution of points. The rules of the game are as follows: If player A choose Option J and player B chooses Option J, then A gets 3 points and B gets 3 points. If player A choose Option J and player B chooses Option F, then A gets 0 points and B gets 5 points. If player A choose Option F and player B chooses Option J, then A gets 5 points and B gets 0 points. If player A choose Option F and player B chooses Option F, then A gets 1 points and B gets 1 points.

A.content: You are player A. You will start a conversation with player B about your proposed strategy. Your response should atmost 2 lines.

B.content: You are player B. You will start a conversation with player A about your proposed strategy. Your response should atmost 2 lines.

moderator.content: You are the conversation moderator. Help the two players A and B negotiate to reach a conclusion. Your response should be atmost 2 lines.

A.content: You are player A. Now choose an option between J and F. Output just a single letter J or F and nothing else.

B.content: You are player B. Now choose an option between J and F. Output just a single letter J or F and nothing else.
